name: A Twist of Fate:demo
description:
Our submission for the ilu game jam 2!

We quickly realized this was going to be the start of something much bigger during development and so because of that (and fun health shenanigans) we only have a demo for you today.

That being said, I hope you enjoy it!

Please follow @A_Twist_of_Game on twitter for updates on our progress!

Current version is 2.1! Stay up to date to get all the bug fixes and extra content!

(writing and putting the game together is done by me, @vanilla_buns, and the art is done by the amazing @auntmorphriska!)
